participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and active, enjoys outdoor activities and sports.
participant_1.background: I met my husband at a cosplay event and we've been together ever since. My thumbs are getting in the way of my typing, but I'm enjoying the peace and quiet of living by the lake. My husband was a career soldier. I started my own business and now work from home, which allows me to take my morning walks to the beach more often. I played field hockey and soccer with my friends and ate a big cake.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easy-going and animal-loving, enjoys trying new hobbies.
participant_2.background: I don't dye my hair, but I love animals. My adopted dad works at HP. I like to pickle eggs. My relationship with my boss is still in its early stages. We have a dog.

content.text: I just finished a walk to the beach. It was nice and sunny out.
Hey! I like to go for walks too. I recently got a dog and we take walks every day.
Oh, that sounds fun! What kind of dog did you get?
I got a golden retriever. Her name is Luna.
Aww, golden retrievers are so cute! I love dogs.
I used to play field hockey and soccer with my friends. I was really good at it.
That's cool! I've never played sports.
Oh, you should try it! It's really fun.
I might have to try it sometime.
Yeah, I need to get more exercise.
I know what you mean. I've been trying to get more exercise lately too.
I'm going to try to go for a walk every day.
That's a good idea! I'm going to try to do that too.
I think we should start a walking group.
That would be fun! We could meet up at the beach and walk every day.
That sounds like a great idea
